comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: welcome bro, make it independent please (https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/tree/v1.77.3-dev/Add-ons), so we could use it as add-on

comments.author: magriggs
comments.snippet:
@q9HugW I have a first working version of this, which I propose to commit. At present it will preserve the following connection types from a SecureCRT export file:

1. Telnet sessions
2. SSH1/SSH2 sessions
3. RDP sessions
4. RLogin sessions
5. RAW sessions

It will bring the following fields across:

1. Name
2. Hostname
3. Port
4. Protocol
5. Username
6. Description (all lines merged into a single line)

Note that, for security reasons, it will NOT decrypt passwords and will NOT...
